description_0: An indoor close-up view of a person juggling a giant watermelon prop with their feet, The watermelon appears to be round and has a red design in the front meant to mimic the inside of the fruit with it's seeds and rind, the exterior design has dark and light green squiggly pattern. The feet in the image has black slip on shoes with white accents, the feet appear to be curved and the legs are positioned at the bottom of the photo, there is also a white background with a diagonal red line coming from the left top corner.
description_1: A medium view of a person's legs juggling a watermelon prop with their feet. The watermelon is cut in half with a view of the inside of the bright red watermelon with multiple small black seeds and a white line outlining the watermelon. The outside of the watermelon is dark green with sage green wavy line patterns. A slight view of the person's feet is shown below the watermelon. They have on black slip on tennis shoes that are slightly blurry due to the movement being made. The background wall is white with a dark red thick line going vertically, on the left side.
